version_name: includes a quick glance view and an app that shows your upcoming events for today and tomorrow

version_description: General improvements
Stability and performance enhancements

We have improved the layout of the Calendar Presets tab in this version. It is prominent now and you can even add pictures to your presets to help remember them! We have great things planned for Presets, so stay tuned! Additionally, this update further im

- optimizes storage of preset pictures
- fixes a bug where preset order would not be remembered after reordering
- fixes bugs with using the Tools menu in landscape orientation
- uses the calendar time zone for the current time indicator in week

The last update caused some crashes upon launch for users on iOS 10. We have fixed them in this version.

We know you love sharing your events with friends and family, and so we have made it really simple to do just that! The event details popup now includes a quick action bar to easily share your events using any app you like or in Messages or by email. Do g

Introducing Reminders! You asked for it, and here it is! Now you can easily use WeekCal to create reminders for everything from picking up your groceries to calling your loved ones on their birthday. You can even create location based alerts to remind you

Introducing Reminders! You asked for it, and here it is! Now you can easily use WeekCal to create reminders for everything from picking up your groceries to calling your loved ones on their birthday. You can even create location based alerts to remind you
This version introduces some stability improvements.

此更新包括UI bug修复，一般的优化和改进的崩溃为更好的用户体验向前发展报告。

详细地说，这包括：

•次要用户界面错误修正为天，议程，迷你月和年的日历视图
•改进崩溃报告
•更新了App Store的截图
•Bug修复，优化和稳定性方面的改进
•我们的结论在应用程序的调查，感谢大家谁参加！我们正在审查您的反馈和将纳入你的建议纳入未来的更新。

有意见或建议，我们呢？请给我们通过该应用程序的帮助部分的线，我们会很快回信助阵。

这里是一个的包含在这个版本的一切：
•iOS的13优化
•通过10种不同的颜色之间选择自定义您的应用程序图标。
•随时更改设置你的应用程序图标 - >布局 - >应用程序图标颜色
•一般错误修复和改进的应用程序

特别感谢我们的支持WeekCal Pro的用户，敬请期待我们与iOS 13优化未来的更新！

- 该WeekCal团队

新WeekCal更新已经来临！

特别感谢我们所有的用户，尤其是我们的WeekCal Pro用户 - 感谢支持应用程序和制作WeekCal可能！

这里是什么，你会在此版本中发现：

●暗模式已经到达WeekCal。要启用，进入设置 - >布局和启用自动配色方案。 WeekCal现在将尊重您的设备暗模式设置，也可以手动启用通过控制中心暗模式。

●现在苹果腕表系列4和5表盘并发症的支持
改进的搜索过滤，开始和结束的功能和导航功能的iOS 13.搜

新的WeekCal更新已经到来！

特别感谢我们所有的用户，尤其是WeekCal Pro订户-感谢您对应用程序的支持，并使WeekCal成为可能！

●根据您的反馈，此更新包括对我们最新版本的一些小但重要的改进。这包括针对iOS 12用户的改进（白色文本，复制/粘贴，缺少事件删除按钮）以及针对所有用户的暗模式的改进（自定义事件颜色上的文本颜色现已优化）。

●如果要禁用深色模式，请在iOS设置中禁用它，或在WeekCal中转到“设置”->“布局”->“配色方

Special thanks to all of our users, especially our WeekCal Pro subscribers - thanks for supporting the app & making WeekCal possible!

- By popular demand, iPad support has arrived in WeekCal. You can now use WeekCal on iPad and iPad Pro devices
